translations.Y6ArvwgmI4e: Choose the type of local alert that best fits your situation. The alert type will appear on your post. {learn_more_link}
translations.a8f0PgZd0-G: Ex: severe storm heat advisory, natural disaster
translations.icsrBqQNesO: Ex: construction, road closure, traffic delay
translations.nT8iw57uw2r: Select how long you want your voting alert to be in effect. Your post will only be marked as an alert for the set amount of time, but the post will stay published after the alert period has ended.
translations.QJ1tmiTuomL: Select how long you want your alert to be in effect. Your post will only be marked as a local alert for the set amount of time, but the post itself will stay published after the alert period has ended.
translations.JOq8jq4ScPC: We'll review your post before marking it as a voting alert. Once it's approved, people in your selected audience will be notified. {learn_more_link}
translations.QbDZubkkSP6: Marking your post as a local alert sends a notification to people in the area you select. Keep alerts relevant to people in the specified area, timely, and actionable. {learn_more_link}
translations.qiL6Vjk54Ge: If this alert is for a specific election, enter the election date. This will be displayed on your alert.
translations.fq30Wpm3ZJX: One or more local areas in {location}
translations.4-SEb9cyECc: Send alerts to all people in the area you select.
translations.gwSahVFW8Oi: Send alert to followers and people who follow similar Pages in your area.
translations.o7dmXeen6Nt: Send alerts to all affected people
translations.nk4OxMBPJBc: Remember, voting alerts must be be shown to all voters affected by the alert. Any alert sent to only a portion of people in a relevant area may result in removal of the alert. {see_guidelines_link}
translations.JgKWwDuY8QC: Let more people see your alert via Instagram. The notification may be seen by people living within the geographic region you select above.

BkMImbk89YG.*: Posting a {alert type} for {expiration_time} hours in {locations}. {edit_link}
BkMImbk89YG._1: Posting a {alert type} for {expiration_time} hour in {locations}. {edit_link}

translations.QSFgKBr0Wt7: You can only add {maxselect} photos to a post.

*.*: A status can't be longer than {maxselect} characters. Please make yours {number} characters shorter and try again.
A status can't be longer than {maxselect} characters, but this one is {number} characters in length. Please make it a little shorter and try again.

translations.YWZCc1pIIdm: Your post has successfully been shared
translations.cyTk8PoeTIM: Your post has successfully been shared with {audience}
translations._KMLLhPJP31: Something went wrong. Please try again. You may want to check your connection and file sizes.
translations.NEewSjMkAV1: Posts with more info might be more engaging to your audience. Try adding more details to your post.
translations.Top7DJ9uhcK: Try adding a photo to your post
translations.IiuMXctw3vl: Photos are a great way to capture people's attention and share your message in an interesting way.
translations.u4xu1NaKl7i: Make your post stand out with a background
translations.7Y9-GUsO5lF: Add a touch of personality or branding to your post with a customisable background.
translations.kHAfSl26pGL: Add a personal touch to your post with feelings and activities
translations.T8EYv33_rrG: Share an emoji that shows how you're feeling or what you're doing.
translations.Pv90c6JK9P8: Make your post stand out with a GIF
translations.T016Nf6e0FZ: Share a GIF that's related to your post to make it more engaging.
translations.HqcpJ9SgPLR: Simplify your post by sharing 1 photo instead of multiple
translations.RxpbrrVx-dw: A single, high-quality photo can make a stronger impression than multiple photos.
translations.YkVk8looNd4: Try adding a hashtag to your post
translations.2-sSAtky9Uq: Hashtags are a good way to help people discover your post.
translations.DlZKbZSc8fq: Use fewer capital letters in your caption
translations.m4naEdeOPx8: Too many can be distracting or might make people think that your post is clickbait.
translations._-CAYrOc-1O: Enter the number associated with your WhatsApp account, where people can message you directly from your post.
translations.cW6VvEpcP_9: Next, enter the code that we've sent on WhatsApp to {=m2} to connect your account to your Page. The code may take a few minutes to arrive. {edit button}
translations.xIaTmsw2oh6: You changed the audience of this post to {privacy_option}. This post hasn't been shared yet.
translations.SaawGxW3FoD: You're sharing to your default audience. You can always change it.
translations.Oap1eBob0Br: You can't post while media is uploading
translations.pt2rO4x5fdq: Please fill in missing information to continue. Enter the {field} field for your post.
translations.UZXCbPRm3Il: Start more conversations across Messenger, Instagram and WhatsApp that can lead to sales. You'll choose your settings after you've clicked Post.
translations.dyslvLDyjdH: Boost this post to get more messages
translations.sZuMm161RsO: Get more people to see and engage with your post. You'll choose the settings after you've clicked Post.
translations.GBEw2xvVSWf: You cannot create a Send Message post without attaching media
translations.ceribSGhigg: Get more people to see and engage with your post with a WhatsApp button. You can customise how to boost it after you {=m1}.
translations.USmCGLXLWWs: Boost this post to discover more leads
translations.OSl6B-uAN62: You cannot create a Send WhatsApp Message post without attaching media
translations.1SABNpxPdgG: You'll choose settings after you click Post.
translations.9JyxxzBBEZl: You'll choose settings after you've clicked Save.
translations.PPKEgY7P5Fd: You'll choose settings after you've clicked Post. You can only boost public posts.
translations.7BAJ8hitt1j: You'll choose settings after you've clicked Save. You can only boost public posts.
